display_long_description:
# Unleash Explosive Magic

Unleash the power of magic and bend space and time like never before in MAGE! Master 12 powerful spells (with more to come) and create explosive combos by dual-wielding magic. Fly through dynamic magical chaos with intuitive aerial controls, experiencing breathtaking 120FPS visuals with stunning VFX.

[media]

# Control Time Itself

Take control of time itself: slow it down, stop it, or even reverse its flow whenever you please. 

[media]

# Experience Epic Physics

Dive into massive, high-intensity physics simulations with hundreds of props, with zero lag or loading screens, all powered by a custom engine with custom physics, purpose built for Meta Quest 3 and Meta Quest 3S. 

[media]

Embark on your magical journey today.

Fly through dynamic magical chaos with intuitive aerial controls, experiencing breathtaking 120FPS visuals with stunning VFX.

# Control Time Itself

Take control of time itself: slow it down, stop it, or even reverse its flow whenever you please. 

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/473392200_955194073400424_4596689110481855813_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=HmfrDUhb-UMQ7kNvwEihN8-&_nc_oc=Adnrl5D8QKrvyzpUfkHgPH_c9nJWd5azIxUJhtXfBcPjWHy1pIuQWH3_N1HlQdI-WPs&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=nirBG8E5FVPTaidmr-UMzg&oh=00_AfMZ9PVryXIbHrce4zvlAYdUftFhqtYLbZXKgNjgpFtteg&oe=685284C0)

# Experience Epic Physics

Dive into massive, high-intensity physics simulations with hundreds of props, with zero lag or loading screens, all powered by a custom engine with custom physics, purpose built for Meta Quest 3 and Meta Quest 3S. 

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/473392066_1578021460255357_4757116626846878463_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=gHwy28f86ZYQ7kNvwH81ij_&_nc_oc=Adk30KFyZfl4YVTUbIRo_yXo3Kdh7ejIlfJPDs_xWdJYN5HZCllqe5eb2dTftZGZnbw&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=nirBG8E5FVPTaidmr-UMzg&oh=00_AfN3Tq8Wku91beMYV0o_kIOCwe4YJEu0jF1QY5psJhqp6g&oe=68526B89)

Embark on your magical journey today.
